## Description {#details}

A private abstract base class describing the concept of an individual alias analysis implementation.

This interface is implemented by any <code>Model</code> instantiation. It is also the interface which a type used to instantiate the model must provide.

All of these methods model methods by the same name in the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a></code> class. Only differences and specifics to how the implementations are called are documented here.

Definition at line 705 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.

## Alias Queries

### alias {#a505c66e1248723049d5975aa14ff2a47}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual AliasResult llvm::AAResults::Concept::alias (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp; LocA, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp; LocB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a> &amp; AAQI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; CtxI)</>}>
The main low level interface to the alias analysis implementation.

Returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult">AliasResult</a> indicating whether the two pointers are aliased to each other. This is the interface that must be implemented by specific alias analysis implementations.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00717">717</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Simple mod/ref information

### getArgModRefInfo {#aa478d2c71803ef3e2ad9c852a9cf2a53}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual ModRefInfo llvm::AAResults::Concept::getArgModRefInfo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42; Call, unsigned ArgIdx)</>}>
Get the ModRef info associated with a pointer argument of a callsite.

The result&#39;s bits are set to indicate the allowed aliasing ModRef kinds. Note that these bits do not necessarily account for the overall behavior of the function, but rather only provide additional per-argument information.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00739">739</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.

### getModRefInfo {#a6076406e8eefaa39178fe52f0e812c96}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual ModRefInfo llvm::AAResults::Concept::getModRefInfo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42; Call1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42; Call2, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a> &amp; AAQI)</>}>
Return information about whether two call sites may refer to the same set of memory locations.

See the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> documentation for details: <a href="http://llvm.org/docs/AliasAnalysis.html#ModRefInfo">http://llvm.org/docs/AliasAnalysis.html#ModRefInfo</a>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00758">758</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getModRefInfoMask {#a68270a548a0601cd6ad30e5263cfc8dc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual ModRefInfo llvm::AAResults::Concept::getModRefInfoMask (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp; Loc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a> &amp; AAQI, bool IgnoreLocals)</>}>
Returns a bitmask that should be unconditionally applied to the ModRef info of a memory location.

This allows us to eliminate Mod and/or Ref from the ModRef info based on the knowledge that the memory location points to constant and/or locally-invariant memory.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h/#l00730">730</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/aliasanalysis-h">AliasAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
